layer_sequence_get_speedscale: With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current playback speed scale. This is the multiplier value used to slow down or speed up the playback speed. A value of 1 is the default value, and values lower than 1 mean that playback is slowed down and values greater than 1 mean that playback is sped up.
The unique ID value of the sequence element to target
The above code checks the the current playhead speed scale of the sequence element ID stored in the variable "title_sequence", and if it's not set to 1 it is set to this value.
